DOC.brief_summary: This pilot project intend determine feasibility detect soft tissue change response osteopathic manipulative treatment ( OMT ) . MRIs lumbar pelvic region low back pain ( LBP ) patient take two different time point OMT . Images obtain quantitatively analyze change volume back muscle change ( T2 signal ) indicative activity level pathological condition . Electromyography ( EMG ) use independent measure back muscle activity comparison MRI result .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot MRI Study Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment Acute Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Adult patient ( 1855 ) Patients LBP acute symptom ( within last 3 week ) Test positive lumbar somatic dysfunction Exclusion criterion : History spinal injuries/surgeries Positive finding frank neurological sign physical exam Any orthopedic neurological impairment Unsuitable MRI imaging : Cardiac pacemaker defibrillator Severe Claustrophobia Injured metallic object remove Cochlear ( ear ) implant Surgery involve metallic implant ( e.g . knee replacement ) Weight 300 lbs/136 kg ( weight limit scanner bed )
